practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Business Law|Criminal Defense|Elder Law|Employment Law|Estate Planning|Family Law|Personal Injury|Probate & Estate Administration
description:
Devoted to helping you with all of the important and pressing legal issues affecting your life, your company, your family and your future, the attorneys at WH Law Offices are fully prepared to do whatever they can to help you face your legal challenges head-on and improve the likelihood you will obtain the favorable outcome you expect and deserve for your legal needs involving any of the following practice areas:

• Business law
• Bankruptcy
• Criminal defense
• Estate planning
• Probate and estate administration
• Elder law
• Employment law
• Family law
• Personal injury

Possessing decades of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys have the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently. What's more, we offer highly affordable rates to fit any budget so that you can obtain the quality legal counsel you need without having to worry about it depleting your bank account.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned numerous top rankings and endorsements from our peers as well as "Superb" client ratings on Avvo. As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include five total offices across central Arkansas, so you are never far away from the effective legal representation you need when you need it the most.

For more information on how we can best assist you with your legal matter, you can contact WH Law Offices by phone, by email or through our website to set up a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe in today's uncertain environment.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
